Key Match Events: Lisandro Martínez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 35th minute
Kevin Rodríguez equalized for Ecuador in the 90+1st minute
Argentina won the match 4-2 on penalties
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi missed a penalty in the shootout but Emi Martinez helped to spare his blushes with two saves
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta
Others: Argentina will next play either Venezuela or Canada in the semifinals
